errors.iAmMissingPermissions: I am missing permissions. To run this command I need the `{perm}` permission.

errors.noChannel: You must be in a voice channel.
errors.onlyDJ: You must have the DJ role to use this command.

music.kickedFromChannel: I was kicked from the Voice channel. Stopping the music and deleting the queue.
music.noListeners: No members remain in `{channel}`, so I have paused the music.
music.left: Disconnected from `{channel}` because it has been inactive for 5 minutes.

errors.missingPermissions: You are not able to use moderation commands. You require the `{perm}` permission.
errors.cantPunishSelf: I'm not sure you want to do that.
errors.cantPunishOwner: You cannot punish the server owner.

profanity.warn: {user}, please keep swearing to a minimum! (`{filteredPhrase}`)

phrase.warn: {user}, please do not used blacklisted words!

log.title: Raid Detected
log.possible: `{accounts}` users have been detected to be participating in a raid.

blacklist.blacklistedRole: You cannot run `{command}` because you have a blacklisted role.

reactionRoles.addedRole: Successfully gave you the `{role}` role in {guild}.

suggestions.noFeedback: No feedback was provided for the suggestion
